sentence.text: However, in HaCaT and HEK293T cells that display transformed phenotypes, but do not originate from patient-derived tumors, the ER stress-inducing treatments resulted in an upregulation of negative regulation of protein phosphorylation and cellular glucose homeostasis, but not aging transcripts, By a luciferase reporter approach we identified a highly active response to endoplasmic reticulum stress-responsive element within the upstream region of the KRT16 gene.
The results suggest a conditional regulation of aging gene by response to endoplasmic reticulum stress that may be inhibited in normal cells, but engaged during cancer progression.
